## writing my first function

z-score computation
```{r}
x_vec = rnorm(n = 25, mean = 10, sd = 3.5)

(x_vec - mean(x_vec)) / sd(x_vec)
```

```{r}
z_score = function(x) {
  if (!is.numeric(x)){
    stop("x needs to be number")
  }
  if (length(x) < 5){
    stop("you need at least five numbers to compute the z score")
  }
   
    
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  
  return(z)
}
z_score(x = x_vec)
```

```{r, error=TRUE}
z_score(x = 3)
z_score(x = c("my","name"))
```
